definition: a branch of the Xianbei 鮮卑|鲜卑 nomadic people/two-character surname Murong

sentences.english: Murong Xuecun (moo-rong shweh-tswen) is the pen name of Hao Qun.
sentences.chinese: 慕容雪村的真名叫郝羣，慕容只是他的筆名。

sentences.english: Murong Xuecun (moo-rong shweh-tswen) is the pen name of Hao Qun.
sentences.chinese: 慕容雪村的真名叫郝羣，慕容只是他的筆名。

sentences.english: Consequently, Murong Huang reduced the displaced prefectures to displaced counties and further weakened the power of the Han establishments.
sentences.chinese: 慕容就將僑郡改置爲僑縣，進一步削弱大族的勢力。

sentences.english: Rivers Deng and company turned and rushed toward Restorus.
sentences.chinese: 鄧百川等忙轉向嚮慕容復奔去。

sentences.english: Murong Yujun was born in Guangzhou in 1927 with the original name of Li Weike.
sentences.chinese: 慕容羽軍，本名李維克，一九二七年出生於廣州。

sentences.english: Newspapers ran articles on Mr.Murong's role in alerting the police to the fraud ring.
sentences.chinese: 報紙上登出了關於慕容在通知警方抓獲騙子的形象。

sentences.english: Murong yelled at the editor, smashed a cup on the floor and punched the wall of his home.
sentences.chinese: 慕容朝編輯發火，把杯子摔在地上，砸自己家裏的牆。

sentences.english: These are a few of those romantic poems from Xi Muyong.
sentences.chinese: 這是席慕容詩集中少有的甜美詩中的一首。

sentences.english: Mr.Murong eventually persuaded another house to publish a complete edition of the Chengdu novel.
sentences.chinese: 慕容最後說服了一家出版社去出版“成都”的全版。

sentences.english: And this day also thanks Xiao Feng and a surname just about the great rejoicing day of Qiu Di marriage.
sentences.chinese: 而這天也正是謝曉峯和慕容秋荻結婚的大喜日子。

sentences.english: Murong established the Southern Yan regime with Hebei family of many branches as its principal part.
sentences.chinese: 慕容氏以其爲主體之一，建立了南燕政權。

sentences.english: But the freewheeling nature of the Internet could surprise even Mr. Murong.
sentences.chinese: 但網絡的無拘無束讓慕容感到震驚。

sentences.english: Read Xi Murong's poetry, elegant fragrance, clear and there is no hatred, after sorrow.
sentences.chinese: 讀席慕容的詩，淡雅芬芳，明瞭的憂傷之後沒有仇怨。

sentences.english: Its editors decided to award Mr. Murong the magazine's annual literature prize.
sentences.chinese: 它的編輯決定授予慕容這個雜誌的年度文學獎。

sentences.english: Small voice that Murong Jing "Jing, you will, and she returned to Beijing this time to marry you?"
sentences.chinese: 小音看到慕容靖，“靖，你此次會和她回京結婚吧？”

definition: old place name (in modern Linyi county 臨猗縣|临猗县, Shanxi)/two-character surname Linghu
Nangong county level city in Xingtai 邢台[Xing2 tai2], Hebei
to approach/to rise high/thick ice/to insult or maltreat
branch of the Xianbei 鮮卑|鲜卑 nomadic people, founders of Wei 北魏 of the Northern Dynasties (386-534)/also written 拓拔
